Literature.Title: Identification, Recombinant Expression, and Characterization of LHG2, a Novel Antimicrobial Peptide of Lactobacillus casei HZ1.
Literature.Author: He J, Luo X, Jin D, Wang Y, Zhang T

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=8 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:<20% Hemolysis=16 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=40 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=8µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 7611(MIC=4µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 7611(MBC=8µM),Lacticaseibacillus casei HZ1(MIC=32µM),Lacticaseibacillus casei HZ1(MBC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>256µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MBC=>256µM),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=64µM),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MBC=128µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=>256µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MBC=>256µM),Pichia pastoris(MIC=>256µM),Pichia pastoris(MBC=>256µM)
